  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120589</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120589</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Opiši  porazdelitev  naboja in poišči električni potencial vzdolž kondenzatorja</string>
            <string language="en">Describe the charge distribution and find the electric potential across a capacitor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreiben Sie die Ladung Verteilung und finden 
Sie das elektrische Potential über einem Kondensator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décrivez la distribution de charge et trouvez le
potentiel électrique à travers un condensateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descreva a distribuição da carga e encontre o 
potencial elétrico através de um capacitor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descriva la distribuzione della carica e trovi il
potenziale elettrico attraverso un condensatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγράψτε τη διανομή δαπανών και βρείτε την 
ηλεκτρική δυνατότητα πέρα από έναν πυκνωτή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Describa la distribución de la carga y encuentre
el potencial eléctrico a través de un condensador</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Električno polje pri ploščatem kondenzatorju.</string>
            <string language="en">The electric field in case of a capacitor build from two plates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kondenzator</string>
            <string language="en">capacitor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die elektrischen fangen falls von einem 
Kondensatorbau von zwei Platten auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le champ électrique en cas de construction de 
condensateur de deux plats.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O campo elétrico caso que de uma configuração 
do capacitor de duas placas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il campo elettrico nel caso di una configurazione
del condensatore da due piastre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ηλεκτρικό πεδίο σε περίπτωση πυκνωτή χτίζει από 
δύο πιάτα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El campo eléctrico en caso de que de una 
estructura del condensador a partir de dos placas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">condensateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">capacitor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">condensatore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυκνωτής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">condensador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
